page.title: 07Education in Bognor
page.content: There are 2 Comprehensive Schools taking children from 11 to 18. There are 11 primary,infant and junior schools taking children from 5 to 11,5 to 7 and 7 to 11 respectively. There is the{West Sussex Institute of {Higher Education.}It was founded in 1947.One of the newest buildings there is the large modern library.There is a student union too.This has offices and a bar and a recreation lounge.The site covers {33}acres including playing fields,just over a mile from the sea and town centre.The total books stock is over 130,000 volumes.There is a variety of degrees on offer.Teacher training is undertaken there.
